sect1.title: Commercial Support
sect1.para: The mailing lists, irc, and documentation are helpful, but your company might require more in-depth assistance or custom development. If so feel free to contact the following freelance developers and companies directly to discuss a commercial arrangement. If necessary we can also build larger development teams.

tr.td: Openismus: Custom software development using open source software.
Made to Order Software Corp.: Quality software with easy to use interfaces from simple utilities to complex e-Business solutions.

sect1.para:
